description:
The first gathering in the Bristol series.

The DevOps, Dev & Test Gathering brings together experts, and those interested in IT, in an informal social environment. During the evening, there are talks from leading industry experts, free welcome drinks and the opportunity to get to know colleagues across the broad spectrum of IT.

We aim to encourage cross-disciplinary wisdom through the sharing of experiences and ideas from all corners of the SDLC.

Accessibility: the room is accessible however the venue does not have a disabled bathroom.

Here's a list of topics people would like to hear about – can you give a future talk on any of these topics?
DevOps
Testing
Automation Tooling
Software Development
Cyber security and data security

If you have something you'd like to talk about at a future meetup, submit your talk title by email to [masked] and book in a quick call
title: Bristol DevOps, Dev & Test Gathering
